hero.title: From Application to Integration
hero.subtitle: We Guide Your Journey
hero.description: Angitha is your trusted partner for university preparation and Canadian settlement services. We specialize in academic planning, university applications, immigration processes, and successful integration into Canadian society.
hero.details: Whether you're a high school student preparing for university studies or a newcomer seeking immigration, settlement, and employment support, we provide comprehensive guidance every step of the way.
hero.expertise: Our comprehensive support services are designed to help newcomers, refugees, students, and job seekers integrate into Canadian society and achieve their goals. Our approach to newcomer integration is comprehensive and focuses on providing essential services that address the unique challenges individuals and families face when starting their journey in Canada.
hero.cta: Are you ready to start your migration journey? we are here to guide you every step of the way!

about.title: About Angitha

virtualTour.title: Student Success Stories
virtualTour.description: Discover how we've helped students achieve their dreams

bestDeal.title: Immigration Excellence
bestDeal.description: Professional guidance for your Canadian journey

about.description1: Angitha is a leading Canadian immigration and student services company dedicated to helping newcomers, refugees, students, and job seekers successfully integrate into Canadian society. With years of experience in immigration consulting and academic planning, we provide comprehensive support services that address the unique challenges of starting a new life in Canada.
about.description2: Our team of certified immigration consultants, academic advisors, and settlement specialists work together to create personalized pathways for each client. We understand that every journey is unique, and we tailor our services to meet individual needs and goals.
about.description3: From university applications and academic planning to immigration processes and settlement support, we guide you through every step of your Canadian journey. Our comprehensive approach ensures that you have the knowledge, resources, and support needed to thrive in your new home.
about.description4: At Angitha, we believe in building strong, inclusive communities where everyone can succeed. Our commitment to excellence, personalized service, and ongoing support makes us your trusted partner for a successful transition to life in Canada.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: At Angitha, we provide comprehensive support services designed to help newcomers, refugees, students, and job seekers successfully integrate into Canadian society and achieve their goals.

communityIntegration.title: Building a better future together
communityIntegration.description: Our comprehensive approach to newcomer integration focuses on providing essential services that address the unique challenges faced by individuals and families starting their journey in Canada. We believe in creating a supportive environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to building a stronger, more inclusive community.

features.title: Good reasons to trust us
features.subtitle: For over 25 years, we have been building solid, sustainable, and human projects. Our expertise, transparency, and commitment to quality make MB Group a reliable partner

rigueur.title: Rigor
rigueur.description: We rigorously apply the National Building Code standards that are in force. We build solid, sustainable, and human projects

professionalisme.title: Professionalism
professionalisme.description: Members of the Institute of Construction Economists, the Association of Builders and Urban Development of Quebec

serviceSurMesure.title: Customized service
serviceSurMesure.description: Our goal is to build turnkey projects that meet market needs.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from our clients who have trusted Angitha for their immigration and academic journey to Canada.

homeExpectations.title: A smooth transition to Canadian life
homeExpectations.content: Angitha guided us through every step of our immigration process. From visa applications to finding our first home, their support was invaluable.
homeExpectations.name: Tremblay Family

trustedPartner.title: A trusted partner for my academic journey
trustedPartner.content: Angitha's expertise in university applications and immigration made my transition to Canadian studies seamless. Their guidance was professional and personalized.
trustedPartner.name: Marc Gagnon

smoothCollaboration.title: Exceptional support throughout the process
smoothCollaboration.content: Working with Angitha was a pleasure. Their team provided clear guidance, answered all our questions, and made us feel confident about our future in Canada.
smoothCollaboration.name: Makenna Korsgaard

communityCommitment.title: Sincere commitment to newcomer success
communityCommitment.content: Angitha demonstrated real commitment to helping our family integrate into Canadian society. Their settlement services exceeded our expectations.
communityCommitment.name: Sophie Martineau

constructionExcellence.title: Excellence in immigration consulting
constructionExcellence.content: Our permanent residency application was processed efficiently and successfully. Angitha's expertise in immigration law is outstanding.
constructionExcellence.name: Jean-François Roy

innovationSustainability.title: Innovative approach to settlement services
innovationSustainability.content: Angitha's comprehensive approach to newcomer integration is remarkable. They truly understand the challenges of starting a new life in Canada.
innovationSustainability.name: Marie-Claire Dubois

exceptionalService.title: Exceptional customer service
exceptionalService.content: From the first consultation to receiving our visas, every step was handled with professionalism. Clear communication and ongoing support.
exceptionalService.name: David Chen

strategicVision.title: Strategic guidance for long-term success
strategicVision.content: Angitha's ability to create personalized pathways for newcomers makes them a leader in immigration and settlement services.
strategicVision.name: Isabella Rodriguez
